Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.collections.tables

package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.collections.tables

Interfaces and implementing classes for multi-dimensional data that can be used as node and edge attributes in graphs.

The main classes here are Dimensioner and Table. Table is a multidimensional array of numbers, Strings or Objects. Each Dimensioner associated to the table defines the length of one of its dimensions.

Concrete implementations are provided for all primitive types, String and Object.

The SaveableAsText interface extended by Table provides methods to save the table as a String that can be later used to reconstruct a table through a table descendant class static valueOf(...) method, as in this example:

 Table myTable = new FloatTable(new Dimensioner(3),
    new Dimensioner(5));                  // instantiate a 3x5 table of floats
 String s = myTable.toSaveableString();   // save table into string s
 Table yourTable = FloatTable.valueOf(s); // load the string s into another table

The ObjectTable<T> implementation cannot be saved to and loaded from text because it is impossible to write a generic static valueOf(...) method for the unknown type T. You must write a descendant of ObjectTable<T> with appropriate toSaveableString() and valueOf(...) methods if you want this to be possible.

IndexString provides static methods to convert between index strings and numeric indexes.

Jacques Gignoux - 17 ao√ªt 2021
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Table
    An interface for multidimensional access to data.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BooleanTable
    A multidimensional table of booleans.
    ByteTable
    A multidimensional table of bytes.
    CharTable
    A multidimensional table of chars.
    Dimensioner
    A class to set the dimensions of other objects (typically, multi-dimensional containers such as Table).
    DoubleTable
    A multidimensional table of double-precision floating point numbers.
    FloatTable
    A multidimensional table of single-precision floating point numbers.
    IndexString
    Static methods to describe multidimensional indexes using a string with a R -like syntax.
    IntTable
    A multidimensional table of integers.
    LongTable
    A multidimensional table of long integers.
    ObjectTable<T>
    A multidimensional generic Table to contain any Object descendant.
    ShortTable
    A multidimensional table of short integers.
    StringTable
    A multidimensional table of Strings.
    TableAdapter
    Abstract implementation of Table.
